title: Mystic Tarot
subtitle: Unlock the mysteries of your past, present, and future
description: Experience the ancient art of tarot reading with our mystical three-card spread. Let the cards guide you through life's journey with wisdom passed down through centuries.
questionPlaceholder: What guidance do you seek from the cards today?
questionHelper: Think of a specific situation, decision, or area of your life you'd like insight into.
disclaimer: Our tarot readings are designed for entertainment and self-reflection purposes. While the cards can offer insights and guidance, remember that you hold the power to shape your own destiny.

deck.title: Complete Tarot Deck
deck.desc: Full 78-card deck with traditional Major and Minor Arcana meanings

daily.title: Daily Readings
daily.desc: Unlimited readings to guide your spiritual journey

detailed.title: Detailed Interpretations
detailed.desc: Comprehensive meanings for both upright and reversed card positions
